**Source A: An account from a survivor of the Japanese Occupation**

answers.answer: Fear, food scarcity, threat of arrest by Kempeitai
Asia for Asians - Japanese leadership would liberate Asia from Western colonialism
Trade disrupted, supply routes cut off, resources taken by Japan
